data: Michael Smith works as Senior Management Consultant at ConsultPro Inc. in the Financial Services industry.
Michael Smith has over 8 years of consulting experience with global banks and fintech firms.
Michael Smith has expertise in Strategy Planning, Process Optimization, and Change Management.
Michael Smith reduced operational costs by 15% for a major client and led cross-functional teams across five countries.
Michael Smith served as lead consultant for fintech startups between 2018 and 2022.
Michael Smith is based in New York, New York, United States.
